newsItem.headline: Sporting CP willing to listen to €40-50M offers for Diomande this summer

newNews.reasoning: New information: Sporting CP gentleman's agreement to consider €40-50M offers differs from previous €80M release clause reporting. Crystal Palace deemed out of reach. Date-gated: Feb 26 is after existing Feb 24 news.

statusChanges.source: Yahoo Sports / Research findings confirm 17 appearances, injury resolved
